transcript:

Hello
Hello Madam.
Executive: Ah hello sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Madam company name sir ah kekuthu sir company name sir.
Customer: Scanman Traders.
Executive: Sir one second.
Customer: Scanman Traders.
Executive: Scanman Traders ah sollunga sir.
Customer: Gayatri madam ah.
Executive: Illa sir Gayatri illa sir.
Customer: Okay problem.
Customer: Onnum illa ippo live nethula irunthu vanthuchu nanga.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Hello ah yes mam sollunga mam.
Executive: Actually vanthu enna na engalukku live vantha udane naan intimate panna sonnen yaar mam unga per therinjukalama.
Customer: En per Bhavatharini mam.
Executive: Okay neenga ithu varaikum pesunathu illa Gayatri oruthavanga pesunanga appo innum rendu per pesunanga enakku avanga per therila live vantha udane naan solla sonnen catalogla vanthu catalogla product vanthu transparent packet plain packet vanthu avanga approve pannala something sonnanga illa naalum paravalla oru sila packet vanthu reject pannalum paravalla irukkurathu vachi podunga enakku live pannunaleum avanga enakku sollunga nu sonnen because naan konjam out of stationla irunthunale enakku therila.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: So naan live vantha intimate panna sonnen number one athu pannala kaalaila yaarntha intimationme unga sidele irunthu varala naangala phone panni.
Customer: Ah athu onnum illa mam ippo ippo enakku unga call connect aayirukkuna naan unga account manager irunthaa thaan connect aayirukkum maybe innaikku thaan live vanthirukkum enakku oru two daysla vanthu usage activationku oru mail varum mam athu mail vanthavudane naan ungalukku connect pandren saringala.
Executive: Athu varaikum ithu enna naal poittu irukkunga.
Customer: Illa illa ungalukku vanthu leads vanthu every week sunday thaan ungalukku generate aagum maximum tomorrow or day after tomorrow mail vanthirum vanthavudane naane ungalukku connect panni ungalukku enna enna guidance pannanamo naan pannidren.
Executive: Sari okay naan enna engalukku leads.
Customer: Kaattala as per your.
Executive: Kaattathu kaattathu eppayume vanthu leads vanthu every week sunday thaan visibility athavathu new leads generate aagum.
Executive: Appo daily daily onnu onnu irukkum nu sonnangale athu enathu.
Customer: Athu ellame vanthuttu ippo dailykullathu innaikkum naalaikkum ungalukku generate maybe aayirukkum mam okayngala wait pannunga enakku ethume ithu varaikum varala athu vanthu namma ellam video call onnu welcome call onnu varum mam athu pannathukku apram thaan ellame activation aagum.
Executive: Illa illa athu enakku thaan mail varum naan vantha udane naan koopidren.
Executive: Okay aana vanthu neethu engalukku mail vanthathu like.
Customer: Live aayiruchu mail vanthirukku live aayiruchu nu sollittu.
Executive: Ah athu mail vanthirukkum ippo engaloda sidele vanthu guidance panna solli oru mail varum athu vanthavudane naan ungalukku koopidren okayva maximum ungalukku live mail vanthiruchuna enakku tomorrow vanthirum mam naan vantha udane ungalukku koopidren.
Executive: Okay aana date vanthu ippo neethu day activate day vanthu november 5 appadina naan neethu november 5 2025 to november 4 2026 vanthu one year kaana day vanthu poitte irukkule athunale veenaa pothu naan solrathu puriyutha.
Customer: Puriyuthu mam puriyuthu naan athu maximum athu naalaikku ungalukku activate aayidum naan aana payment poittu irukkule.
Executive: Mam puriyuthu mam but inga activation aana thaan mam naan ungalukku link ithu panna mudiyum because antha maille thaan vanthu ungalukku guidance panra linke varum so antha linkle thaan ungalukku share panni naan join pannuven so okayngala.
Executive: Ungalukku vanthu leadsngurathu oru format vachirukkeenga neenga ethavathu solreengala mam ungalukku vanthu november 2026la vanthu full monthme neenga use pannikkalaam okayngala so athu onnum problem illa athu antha antha ithu padi thaan panna mudiyum athu thaandi thaan ippo naan ithu panna mudiyathu solren.
Executive: Ungalukku neethu live aayiruchu tomorrow day after tomorrow mail vanthirum naane ungalukku koopidren.
Executive: Okay mam intimate pannunga.
Executive: Okay mam intimate pannunga okay mam.
Executive: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Live not activated after a day.

- No intimation from IndiaMART side.

- Leads not visible.

- Doubts about the subscription date.



Resolution:

- Executive assured leads generate every Sunday.

- Explained the activation process and welcome call.

- Clarified the subscription validity until November 2026.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after receiving guidance mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- live activation, leads, subscription date, guidance
